articles.content: If you don't perform, you don't get your chances: Powar on dropping Jemimah, Shikha, Punam

articles.author: TN Sports Desk
articles.title: Hardik Pandya responds to Mumbai Indians' tribute post as they part ways after 7 years - see tweet - Times Now
articles.description: Hardik Pandya has responded to Mumbai Indians' tribute to him after they parted ways. Pandya had joined MI for Rs 10 lakh in 2015 and was retained for Rs 11 crore in 2018. The star all-rounder has now joined the Ahmedabad-based franchise for Rs 15 crore.
articles.content:
• Hardik Pandya ended his 7-year stint with Mumbai Indians and joined Ahmedabad-based franchise before IPL 2022 mega auction
  • Hardik had joined MI for Rs 10 lakh in 2015
